constraints.name: distinct_leq_k
constraints.description: 所有元素最终需要被收集到不超过两个不同的坐标上

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 每次操作只能将某个坐标上的所有元素移动到相邻的坐标上
constraints.formal: move(x) -> move all elements from x to x+1 or x-1

constraints.name: subset_constraint
constraints.description: 查询中添加或删除的元素必须是当前集合中的有效元素
constraints.formal: if t_i = 0, x_i in current_set; if t_i = 1, x_i not in current_set
